title: Pixel Cup Soccer Ultimate Edition
description:
Pixel Cup Soccer is a casual retro-style soccer game, a great evolution from the previous edition. Itâ€™s dynamic , arcade, with fast-paced gameplay, just the fun part of soccer! The game has great pixel art graphics like the games from the 80s and 90s, evoking nostalgia . Move, pass, and shoot the ball to victory. You will learn to play in one minute, but it takes much longer to master it. The Oregon Trail
The simple controls enable a rich set of features such as passing, shooting , tackling, sprinting, dribbling, etc. Play single-player (player VS computer) or local multiplayer (player VS player). Play local multiplayer with your friends. With Remote Play Together , you can play online with your friends in competitive or cooperative modes.
